Sykdomspulsen's poster "Sykdomspulsen - An exciting and forward-looking infrastructure and website for the real-time surveillance of Covid-19, other infections, and deaths" received the prize for "Best Poster" at Helse- og Kvalitetsregisterkonferansen 2021.

Read more about it [here!](https://docs.sykdomspulsen.no/posts/2021-11-18-poster-prize-for-sykdomspulsen/).
